GSD.product_version: versions from v4.19.17 to before v4.19.267
GSD.description:
tipc: fix the msg->req tlv len check in tipc_nl_compat_name_table_dump_header

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v4.19.267 by commit 55a253a6753a603e80b95932ca971ba514aa6ce7, it was introduced in version v4.19.17 by commit 2d5fc1d492d194aa2986c5a9d8a48a60e9143a72. For more details please see the references link.
